ISSUE.TITLE: Build arm64 images
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now all the Gitness images on Docker Hub are only built for amd64. It would be cool if we could get arm64 images as well so that the application can be easily deployed on other devices such as Raspberry Pis.
